plot: Loading dock worker Arnie's work and family life get turned upside-down when he suddenly gets promoted to a high-level management position.
plot_en: Loading dock worker Arnie's work and family life get turned upside-down when he suddenly gets promoted to a high-level management position.

title: Arnie
